title: Auto Generate our LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt files
description: Once LUCENE-2952 is in place, we should be able to automatically generate Lucene and Solr's LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt file (without massive duplication)

comments.content:
We need to be careful about an auto generated NOTICE... it's supposed to be minimal and only contain legally required attributions.
